Articles.Content:
I'm new to KSP and figured I'd say hi after finally deciding to find the forums. It took about an hour of demo play to realize I needed to purchase this. It really is an absolutely amazing experience playing this.

I really don't have a clue what I'm doing half of the time that makes it more enjoyable. I've decided to stay away from the videos and tutorials and learn from trial and error. Took me quite a long time I'm guessing compared to others to just reach orbit but it was a satisfying feat due to the process and failures to get there. Many Kerbals have died or been stranded along the way. My recovery development program has swung into full force now so maybe one day they can return home.

Look forward to the community here and many hours of fun.
